remarks:
Formula-building rule for restricted universal quantifiers (deduction rule).  (Contributed by NM, 4-Mar-1997.)  Reduce dependencies on axioms.  (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 9-Dec-2019.) 

---

 Formula-building rule for restricted universal quantifiers (deduction rule).  (Contributed by NM, 4-Mar-1997.)
statement:
2ralbidva.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
2ralbidva $p |- ( ph -> ( A. x e. A A. y e. B ps <-> A. x e. A A. y e. B ch ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d ph x y $.
